description: This file sets up a knowledge base using DOCX documents and a vector database, then creates an agent to query this knowledge base.

classes.name: DocxKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Class responsible for managing a knowledge base of DOCX documents.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: Class representing a vector database using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating it.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query.
